formulas.raw: Monthly rate: $ r = \\dfrac{\\text{APR}}{12} $ Payment for target months: $ M = \\dfrac{B\\,r}{1 - (1+r)^{-n}} $ Months for a fixed payment (when $M > B\\,r$): $ n = -\\dfrac{\\ln\\left(1 - \\dfrac{B\\,r}{M}\\right)}{\\ln(1+r)} $ Interest each month: $ I_m = \\text{Balance}_{m-1} \\times r $; Principal paid: $ P_m = M - I_m $.
